insert into HZ_ACCESSORIES_LIBS( PUID, P_MATERIEL_CODE, P_MATERIEL_NAME, P_TECHNICAL_CONDITIONS, P_MEASURING_UNIT, P_MATERIEL_PURPOSE, P_DOSAGE_BICYCLE, P_NOTE, P_STATUS, P_CREATE_TIME, P_UPDATE_TIME, P_CREATE_NAME, P_UPDATE_NAME )
select #{item.puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pMaterielCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pMaterielName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pTechnicalConditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pMeasuringUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pMaterielPurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pDosageBicycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, sysdate, sysdate, #{item.pCreateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pUpdateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from DUAL
mapper.update:
update HZ_ACCESSORIES_LIBS
PUID= #{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_MATERIEL_CODE= #{pMaterielCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_MATERIEL_NAME= #{pMaterielName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_TECHNICAL_CONDITIONS= #{pTechnicalConditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_MEASURING_UNIT= #{pMeasuringUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_MATERIEL_PURPOSE= #{pMaterielPurpose,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_DOSAGE_BICYCLE= #{pDosageBicycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_NOTE= #{pNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
P_UPDATE_TIME =sysdate,
P_UPDATE_NAME= #{pUpdateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUID = #{puid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * FROM (SELECT u.*,rownum as rn from (SELECT * from HZ_ACCESSORIES_LIBS where P_STATUS=1 order by P_UPDATE_TIME DESC)u WHERE ROWNUM <=#{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}) where rn >#{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from HZ_ACCESSORIES_LIBS where P_STATUS =1
select count(*) FROM HZ_ACCESSORIES_LIBS where P_MATERIEL_CODE = #{pMaterielCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and P_STATUS=1

from HZ_ACCESSORIES_LIBS where P_MATERIEL_CODE = #{pMaterielCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and P_STATUS=1
